name: Mela d'Alba (Apple Brandy Negroni)
description: This apple brandy–based variation on the classic Negroni cocktail is spicy, rich, and bittersweet.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces (60ml) Laird's Bonded Apple Brandy (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Add apple brandy, sweet vermouth, and Campari to an ice-filled Old Fashioned glass. Stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Express lemon oils over drink and add lemon twist. Serve immediately.
